articles.title: Trump’s Cartel Order Revives ‘Bitter’ Memories in Latin America
articles.description: President Trump's recent order targeting drug cartels has sparked concerns in Latin America about a potential return to U.S. military interventions reminiscent of the Monroe Doctrine era.

articles.title: Cannabis Poisonings Are Rising, Mostly Among Kids
articles.description: The proliferation of cannabis products like edibles has led to an increase in poisonings among children and teenagers, with symptoms ranging from seizures to severe respiratory issues.

articles.title: Heavy Rains in Wisconsin Lead to Flooding and Early Closure of State Fair
articles.description: Record-setting rainfall in the Milwaukee area caused severe flooding, prompting the early closure of the Wisconsin State Fair and raising concerns about infrastructure resilience.
